nodes.text: CT-1284, nicknamed "Spark," was a rookie stealth operations clone trooper assigned to High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi of the Grand Army of the Republic  towards the middle of the Clone Wars. During the Battle of Christophsis, Spark crewed the stealth ship under the watch of Blackout.

In 22 BBY, Spark, under the command of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker, Admiral Yularen, and Clone Commander Blackout crewed the stealth ship to travel to Christophsis on a supply run, to aid Bail Prestor Organa. However, they ended up fighting against the Confederacy Fleet under the command of Admiral Trench. Later, Skywalker and the rest of the crew defeated Trench.
